title: Is it mandatory to seek refuge in Allah & say Bismillah before reciting Fatiha in prayer? Assim al
transcript: shihab from bangladesh says do is it mandatory to seek refuge in allah from the shaitaan and say bismillah before the fatih or the surah in the prayer the answer is no this is a highly recommended sunnah so if someone intentionally intentionally skips bismillah rahim and prays his prayer is valid
